channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: How Los Angeles Metro Is Honoring Nipsey Hussle on What Would’ve Been His 40th Birthday
item.description: Los Angeles Metro celebrates Nipsey Hussle on his 40th birthday 🎉 Riding the wave of his legacy 🌟 #NipseyHussle #LosAngelesMetro

item.title: BLACKPINK Bring the Bangers to London’s Wembley Stadium: 7 Best Moments
item.description: Blackpink lit up Wembley Stadium with 🔥 vibes! Check out the 7 best moments 🎶🌟 #BLACKPINK #LondonConcerts

item.title: My Morning Jacket Announce Z Deluxe Reissue, Cover Steely Dan’s “Do It Again” At Red Rocks
item.description: 🎸 My Morning Jacket bringing the heat with Z Deluxe reissue and Steely Dan cover at Red Rocks! 🔥🎶 #MusicNews #RockOn

item.title: Charli XCX Bids Farewell to ‘Brat’ Era at South Korean Show, Teases ‘The Moment’ Film
item.description: 🌟 Charli XCX says goodbye to the 'Brat' era and gets us hyped for 'The Moment' film! 🎶✨ #NewMusic #CharliXCX

item.title: Oasis Storm Back to U.K. No. 1 as First Leg of Live ’25 Tour Concludes
item.description: Oasis reigns supreme! 🎸 First leg of Live ’25 Tour wraps up with a bang in the U.K. 🎉 #Oasis #Live25
